## Description {#details}

Iterator for finding all repeated substrings in the suffix tree.

### MinLength {#ac4a1fb796d7e3519fd56118972beda09}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const unsigned llvm::SuffixTree::RepeatedSubstringIterator::MinLength = 2">
The minimum length of a repeated substring to find.

Since we&#39;re outlining, we want at least two instructions in the range. FIXME: This may not be true for targets like <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> which support many instruction lengths.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h/#l00174">174</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/suffixtree-h">SuffixTree.h</a>.
